text: She's the epic game - changing model that's basically all of our life goals rolled into one next level body. A # MeToo activist. The latest Revlon campaign star and her beauty icon is Raquel Welsh ('She's iconic, bronzed, golden and stunning'). Yup, we're talking about the mega babe that is Ashley Graham. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below We rifled through the beauty chameleon's make - up bag to find out the secrets to looking that damn good... On foundation... Revlon's 24 - hour Wear Colorstay Foundation is epic because it goes on really sheer and doesn't get chunky at all. You know how sometimes it creases and builds up? Well,
